title: Authorizes the town of Blooming Grove, in the county of Orange, to finance the accumulated deficit as of June 30, 2011 by the issuance and sale of serial bonds
summary: Authorizes the town of Blooming Grove, in the county of Orange, to finance the accumulated deficit as of June 30, 2011 of the 4 water and 2 sewer districts within such town by the issuance and sale of serial bonds.
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the town of Blooming Grove, in the county of Orange to finance the accumulated deficit as of June 30, 2011 by the issuance and sale of serial bonds
